author: Special Correspondent
text:
Union Power Minister Piyush Goyal took to social media to respond to The Hindu ’s investigation of rural electrification data wherein major discrepancies were found.

The Minister posted on his facebook page: “Read media report regarding rural electrification data. Have asked my officials to visit villages & check with States to verify. Confident of showcasing the transparency brought about by GARV app but due to State level verification requirement and holiday season, some extra time may be required. (sic).”

On Saturday, The Hindu reported that the Centre’s claim of electrifying 7000-plus villages in the last financial year is exaggerated. Inspecting the rural electrification data on the GARV website (garv.gov.in) The Hindu found un-electrified villages were counted as electrified, among other discrepancies.
title: The Hindu impact: Power Minister orders probe
